From: minime_316@...

Prebon

Prebon laughed.

"Excellent! Now, here is the plan. In a few days we'll all go on a 
scout mission at The Ark. You'll tell us which one is Ramulus. I than 
threaten to kill you if he doesn't meet me one on one. If he does, 
Striker goes home. If he doesn't, Striker gets the chip. If Ramulus 
does meet me, than I give him the chip and use him as my middle man 
to control the Maximals! You may go. You can look at Striker all you 
want. But if he wakes up, no mentioning of what I have just told you. 
The only thing I will alow you to say is "I am Master Prebon's now." 
As soon as he wakes up tell me, so the torture can begin. No leaving 
the ship without my permission and no helping him to escape!" Prebon 
was about to walk away, but he turned back.

"Oh, and I hope you know what you've gotten yourself into. I said 
Striker would go. Not you. To save him you have sacrificed a future 
with him. You could've been with him forever, but you decided to sell 
out your friends and lose your love. Have a nice day!"

Prebon left her laughing.
